Producer: Steve Bagheri, Simran Singh, Jose Pablo Cantillo, Milan Chakraborty
Rating: PG-13 (Brief Language|An Accident Scene|Drinking and Teen Sexuality|Thematic Issues)
Synopsis: A troubled ex-ballplayer (Kristoffer Polaha) finds his life reinvigorated through his friendship with a mentally challenged grocery-store employee (David DeSanctis).
Title: Where Hope Grows
